page.title: 08LEISURE-WEST NOTTINGHAM.
page.content: VERNON PARK-Nearly everyone in Basford uses Vernon Park in some way.Children can play on the swings,roundabouts &the assult course.There is a large pond & some people fish there. Adults can play cricket,tennis & bowls or just walk the dog & sunbathe. NORTHERN BATHS-There is also a swimming pool on Vernon Rd. where local people swim &a successful swimming club is based here. CLUBS&SOCIETIES-We can choose from several clubs to go to in our spare time & this makes us luckier than the adults who do not have much to do, nearly all of them feel that there could be more facilities.They can play darts or chat in a pub but must go out of the area for other amusements outside the home.
